parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty recliner assembly can cause the seat back to suddenly collapse or recline, leading to injuries or accidents, especially in the event of sudden stops or crashes.
symptoms: The seat back suddenly collapses or reclines
the seat back does not stay in place
the seat back moves unexpectedly
passengers are injured due to sudden recline.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tire Failure due to Tread Separation
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire failure due to tread separation can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially lead to serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Sudden tire blowout
vibration
tire tread separation
tire failure without warning
tire damage resembling a cut or slice in the center of the tread.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause loss of steering control, making it difficult or impossible to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: Difficulty turning the vehicle
especially when cold
loss of steering control
inability to turn the vehicle to one side
near accidents or accidents due to loss of steering control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat belt retractor can cause the seat belt to not properly secure the passenger, increasing the risk of injury or fatality in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The top part of the seat belt does not retract
the seat belt fails to secure passengers
the seat belt is loose or does not tighten properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rearview and Side View Mirror Design/Installation Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The detachment of the side view mirror or the poor design of the rearview mirror can cause reduced visibility, increasing the risk of accidents or collisions.
symptoms: The side view mirror falls off
the rearview mirror provides a distorted view of the surrounding traffic
making it difficult to judge the distance of other vehicles.
